game.name: Gladiator Command
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Narrated Game Menus, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A gladiator management sim inspired by the depth and progression of Football Manager. Train fighters, hire staff, manage finances, build prestige, buy and sell gladiators, develop traits and stat based skills, and let real-time arena battles decide your rise.
